ovdesc.p: To be created to hold the activities of external agencies during a month.
Commission to pay to agencies are calculated and stored in the table as well and the fields “collector” and “New Queue” are to be set as NO in CL.OUTCOME table.

desc.p: The ID for this file will be an agency ID and month.
Number of payments received through the external agency during the month.
Total amount of payments received through the external agency during the month.
This is the monthly commission to pay to the external agency for the payments received through it.
Number of salary assignment obtained through the external agency during the month.
Total outstanding amount for the salary assignment obtained through the external agency during the month.
This is the monthly commission to pay to the external agency for the assignment of salary obtained through it.
sum of the APAY and ASAL commissions.
